title: Broken
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.This naughty fast-paced alpha billionaire romance series takes a surprising turn just when you least expect it. Ciara’s world is turned upside down during a meeting with a potential client in Barcelona. The men in Ciara Herrera’s life collide and there’s nothing she can do about it. With emotions running high, will Ciara and Nikolaj’s relationship flourish or crumble? The Seduction Factor Book 3––Broken is sure to leave you on the edge of your seat until the surprising ending! The Seduction Factor is a series of 6 books. The entire series has a HEA ending.
author: Scarlett Avery
